page.title: 15BROWNIES IN GROBY
page.content:
My name is Penelope Isaac. On Fridays I go to{Brownies.}It is good at Brownies. We play a game called{Sticky {Witch.}There are two people 'on' and the rest of the Brownies are at the side of the room. Then the Brownies at the side try to run across the hall. If they get tagged they go to the side and that makes more people 'on'.
There's another game called{Hedgehog.} One person has a whistle and another a cloth. We all go skipping round the hall until the whistle is blown. Then we all go down and roll into a ball. The person with the cloth walks round and puts it onto one of us and says "ready". The person in the cloth mustn't move. We have to guess who it is and the person who gets it right is 'on' next time.
